Glowing paints and products. Profitable terms of cooperation. Dealership

Such paints eliminate the light at the total darkness, without any lightening. As we use high-qualified Holland raw materials as the light-accumulating basis, luminous paints are able to eliminate the light not less than 10 hours. The light energy is accumulated both from the daylight and electrical one. 5 types of fluorescent paints, 7 different colors. These paints are very bright under the daylight, and it eliminates deep volumetric glowing under the UV â€œclubâ€ lightening. We have developed out and introduced to production such paints, used not only for textile, flowers and glass, but also for wood, concrete and metal. That is why it opens really unlimited branches of its application. For those, who dreams about being the disco star, we have developed 7 colors of fluorescent nail polishes. 4 types of invisible paints, 3 different colors, glowing in neon lightening. Such paints are completely invisible at the daylight, but it glows deeply under â€œneonâ€ light. These paints are good for painting walls in night clubs, laser show halls, bowling clubs. We also produce 3 colors of â€œcolorlessâ€ nail polishes and invisible paints for paper (for making watermarks), body, self-adhesive film, flowers and etc. We invite all interested people to cooperation. Low prices, discounts, bonuses! We are interested in development of Dealer network all around the world!
